Posts.Content: brewer2 wrote: I had a DIEP flap a few months ago, but unfortunately the PS had to take about a piece of my stomach muslce about the size of a stamp.  I just finished 4 months of chemo.  About half way thru the chemo, my abdomin started to bulge whenever I walked around alot or went from lying down to sitting up.  My ONC didn't seem concerned but it is making me miserable.  Has anyone else experienced bulging?
